表头被选中 th 的 class="active"

                <table class="table-widget">
                    <table class="table-normal">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <th>
                                    <input type="checkbox">
                                </th>
                                <th>ID</th>
                                <th class="active sort-desc">
                                    等级
                                    <span class="sort-icon"></span>
                                </th>
                                <th >文字</th>
                                <th class="active sort-asc align-right">
                                    数字
                                    <span class="sort-icon"></span>
                                </th>
                                <th class="align-right">日期</th>
                                <th class="align-center">操作</th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tbody>
                            <tr>
                                <td>
                                    <input type="checkbox">
                                </td>
                                <td>1</td>
                                <td>1</td>
                                <td>这里是文字</td>
                                <td class="align-right">123</td>
                                <td class="align-right">2013-06-01</td>
                                <td class="align-center">
                                    <a class="btn btn-icon" href="#"><i class="icon-edit"></i></a>
                                    <a class="btn btn-icon btn-danger" data-unique="1" data-placement="top" data-title="警告" bs-popover="'popover.html'" title="">
                                        <i class="icon-remove icon-white"></i>
                                    </a>
                                </td>
                            </tr>
                            ... ...
                        </tbody>
                    </table>

                    <div class="controls controls-row">
                        <div class="pull-left">
                            <button class="btn btn-danger">删除</button>
                            <button class="btn">操作</button>
                            <button class="btn">操作</button>
                            <button class="btn">操作</button>
                        </div>
                        <div class="pull-right">
                            <div class="pagination">
                                <ul>
                                    <li><a href="#">?</a></li>
                                    <li><a href="#">1</a></li>
                                    <li><a href="#">2</a></li>
                                    <li><a href="#">3</a></li>
                                    <li><a href="#">4</a></li>

                                    <li><a href="#">?</a></li>
                                </ul>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

表格基础样式

在table上引用.table-normal

id 文字
1 文字 
                <table class="table-normal">
                    ...
                </table>

表格内部右对齐在对应的th和td上增加.align-rigt, 金钱在对应的th和td上增加.currency， 数字在对应的th和td上增加.number，

id 钱 数字
1 ￥200.00 234234 
            <table class="table-normal">
                <thead>
                    <th>id</th>
                    <th class="currency">钱</th>
                    <th class="number">数字</th>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                    <td>1</td>
                    <td class="currency">￥200.00</td>
                    <td class="number">234234</td>
                </tbody>
            </table>

表格内部居中对齐在对应的th和td上增加.align-center

id 操作
1 
                <table class="table-normal">
                    <thead>
                        <th>id</th>
                        <th class="align-center">操作</th>
                    </thead>
                    <tbody>
                        <td>1</td>
                        <td class="align-center">
                            <a class="btn btn-icon" href="#">
                                <i class="icon-edit"></i>
                            </a>
                        </td>
                    </tbody>
                </table>

表格内部操作按钮统一样式为button效果图标

                <a class="btn btn-icon" href="#">
                    <i class="icon-edit"></i>
                </a>
                <a class="btn btn-icon btn-danger" href="#">
                    <i class="icon-white icon-remove"></i>
                </a>
